headline: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY) to Divest 60% China JV Amid Strategic Realignment
summary: In this article, we will be taking a look at the 10 Best Pharma Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. Bristol-Myers Squibb Company is placed third among them. Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY), a global biopharmaceutical leader in oncology, immunology, cardiovascular disease, and fibrosis, is undergoing major strategic changes as it adapts to shifting market conditions. […]

headline: Bristol Myers says next-gen blood cancer drug hits goal in key study
summary: The drug, iberdomide, is one of a few protein-degrading medicines the company hopes to become successors to its blockbuster Revlimid franchise.
